title: My account says its in the process of transferring and I cant log into support to make a ticket
body: I have reset my password and had my username emailed to me but every time I try to log in on the support site or on the client it says incorrect password or username.

replies.body:
I went ahead and looked into your tickets to see why you thought they were being deleted. It looks like you sent a few different ones for the same thing, so we referred you back to your original ticket. Also, one of our agents has responded and now they're waiting on your reply to get you back in the game!

Be sure to check your email for their response!
Oh They are deleting my tickets too now. I could use some help please.
Had to change to my other account because I can no longer be signed in on that account.
And they charged 200.00 dollars to my bank account.
